get.description: Retrieve User by [id]. (Required to be Admin).

post.description: Update User Profile. (Required to be Authenticated).
Update User Password. (Required to be Authenticated).
Forgot Password?? Get Password Reset Link.

get.description: Search or get Document by [id]. (Requires to be Authenticated).

post.description: Create a new Document. (Requires to be Authenticated).
Delete dcoument. Only possible if {document.status===DRAFT}. (Requires to be Authenticated).
Add signers for Document. (Requires to be Authenticated).
Add Fields for Document. (Requires to be Authenticated).
Send invitation email to recipients for signing document. (Requires to be Authenticated).
Sign a signature field of a Document with [token]
Remove a signature field from a Document with [token]. Only possible if {recipient.signing===NOT_SIGNED}.
Completed your Document Signature. Get Document Share Link.
